products.title: Personalized Stainless Steel Water Bottle 20oz - Custom Name, Font & Color
products.amazon_title: Shelzy's Designs Personalized Water Bottle 20oz Stainless Steel - Custom Name, Font & Color Choice - Double-Wall Insulated, Leak-Proof - Perfect Gift for Bridesmaids, Weddings, Sports

description.short: Premium 20oz stainless steel water bottle with YOUR custom name, font choice, and color. Permanent sublimation printing that never peels or fades.
description.full:
Make It Yours - Fully Customizable

Create a one-of-a-kind water bottle with your name, favorite font, and perfect color. Our permanent sublimation printing infuses the design directly into the bottle - no vinyl stickers that peel!

Premium Quality

  • 20oz capacity - Perfect size for daily hydration
  • Double-wall insulation - Keeps drinks cold 24hrs, hot 12hrs
  • 18/8 stainless steel - BPA-free, rust-resistant
  • Leak-proof lid - Toss it in your bag worry-free
  • Dishwasher safe - Easy cleaning

Perfect For

Bridesmaids, wedding parties, sports teams, teacher gifts, corporate events, or treating yourself!

amazon_bullets: FULLY CUSTOMIZABLE: Add your name (up to 20 characters), choose from 5 elegant fonts, and pick your favorite print color from 8 options including Gold, Rose Gold, and Sage Green

PERMANENT SUBLIMATION PRINTING: Unlike cheap vinyl stickers that peel and crack, our sublimation process infuses the design INTO the bottle coating - it's literally part of the bottle and will never fade or peel
PREMIUM INSULATION: Double-wall vacuum insulated 18/8 stainless steel keeps drinks ice cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours - perfect for gym, office, or outdoor adventures
LEAK-PROOF & DURABLE: Secure twist-on lid with silicone seal prevents spills in your bag. BPA-free, rust-resistant, and built to last through daily use
PERFECT GIFT: Ideal for bridesmaids, wedding parties, sports teams, teachers, nurses, or anyone who deserves something special. Ships in beautiful gift-ready packaging

products.title: Personalized Clear Water Bottle 24oz - Custom Name, Font & Color
products.amazon_title: Shelzy's Designs Personalized Clear Water Bottle 24oz BPA-Free - Custom Name, Font & Color - Lightweight, See-Through Design - Great for Gym, School, Office

description.short: Lightweight 24oz clear water bottle with YOUR custom name, font, and color. See your water level at a glance. BPA-free and eco-friendly.
description.full:
See-Through Style, Personalized For You

Our clear water bottle lets you track your hydration while showing off your custom design. Add your name in your favorite font and color!

Lightweight & Practical

  • 24oz capacity - Stay hydrated all day
  • Crystal clear BPA-free plastic - See your water level
  • Ultra lightweight - Only 0.35 lbs
  • Wide mouth - Easy to fill, add ice, and clean
  • Secure flip-top lid - One-hand operation

Perfect For

Gym sessions, school, office desk, yoga class, hiking, or daily carry!

amazon_bullets: FULLY CUSTOMIZABLE: Add your name (up to 20 characters), choose from 5 stylish fonts, and select your print color from 8 vibrant options including Gold, Rose Gold, Pink, and Sage Green
CRYSTAL CLEAR DESIGN: See-through BPA-free plastic lets you track your water intake throughout the day. Watch yourself hit your hydration goals!
ULTRA LIGHTWEIGHT: At only 0.35 lbs, this 24oz bottle won't weigh down your gym bag, backpack, or purse. Perfect for on-the-go hydration
PRACTICAL FEATURES: Wide mouth opening makes it easy to fill, add ice cubes, and clean. Secure flip-top lid for one-handed drinking
GREAT VALUE GIFT: Affordable personalized gift for gym buddies, coworkers, students, or yourself. Arrives in cute packaging ready to gift

products.title: Stainless Steel Water Bottle 20oz - White - Double-Wall Insulated
products.amazon_title: Shelzy's Designs Stainless Steel Water Bottle 20oz White - Double-Wall Vacuum Insulated - Keeps Drinks Cold 24hrs Hot 12hrs - Leak-Proof, BPA-Free

description.short: Classic white 20oz stainless steel water bottle. Double-wall insulated to keep drinks cold 24hrs or hot 12hrs. Clean, minimal design.
description.full:
Simple. Clean. Quality.

Sometimes you just want a great water bottle without the fuss. Our white stainless steel bottle delivers premium quality in a clean, minimal design.

Premium Features

  • 20oz capacity - Perfect daily size
  • Double-wall vacuum insulation - Cold 24hrs, hot 12hrs
  • 18/8 stainless steel - BPA-free, rust-resistant
  • Powder-coated white finish - Grippy, sweat-free
  • Leak-proof lid - Bag-safe
  • Dishwasher safe

amazon_bullets: PREMIUM QUALITY: 18/8 stainless steel construction with powder-coated white finish. Built to last through years of daily use
SUPERIOR INSULATION: Double-wall vacuum technology keeps drinks ice cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours. No more lukewarm water!
CLEAN MINIMAL DESIGN: Sleek white finish goes with everything. Perfect for those who prefer understated elegance
LEAK-PROOF & PRACTICAL: Secure lid with silicone seal. Sweat-free exterior won't leave rings on your desk. Dishwasher safe for easy cleaning
20OZ PERFECT SIZE: Not too big, not too small - ideal for desk, gym, commute, or anywhere you need hydration

description.full:

  • Crystal clear BPA-free plastic - See your progress
  • Ultra lightweight - Won't weigh you down
  • Wide mouth - Easy fill, ice-friendly

BPA-FREE SAFETY: Made from safe, BPA-free plastic. Feel good about your daily hydration
ULTRA LIGHTWEIGHT: Perfect for gym bags, backpacks, or purses. At only 0.35 lbs, you'll barely notice it
